com.wookler.zconfig.client

Class ZConfigClientEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.zconfig.common.ZConfigEnv
      • com.wookler.zconfig.client.ZConfigClientEnv

  • public class ZConfigClientEnv
extends ZConfigEnv
    Singleton class to define and expose environment settings.

      • setup

        public static void setup(@Nonnull
                         java.lang.String configfile,
                         @Nonnull
                         ConfigProviderFactory.EConfigType type,
                         @Nonnull
                         java.lang.String version)
                  throws ConfigurationException
        Setup the client environment using the passed configuration file. Method to be used in-case the configuration type cannot be deciphered using the file extension.
        Parameters:
        configfile - - Configuration file (path) to read from.
        type - - Configuration type.
        version - - Configuration version (expected)
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
